title.es: Análisis de deals ganados y perdidos

description.nl: Leer hoe je deals correct marked als won of lost, loss reasons tracked, en insights gebruikt voor process improvement.
description.en: Learn how to correctly mark deals as won or lost, track loss reasons, and use insights for process improvement.
description.es: Aprende cómo marcar correctamente deals como ganados o perdidos, rastrear razones de pérdida y usar insights para mejora de procesos.

nl.text: Het correct tracken van won en lost deals is cruciaal voor understanding je sales performance, identifying bottlenecks, en improving conversion rates. Complete en accurate data enables meaningful analysis.

en.text: Correctly tracking won and lost deals is crucial for understanding your sales performance, identifying bottlenecks, and improving conversion rates. Complete and accurate data enables meaningful analysis.

es.text: El seguimiento correcto de deals ganados y perdidos es crucial para entender tu rendimiento de ventas, identificar cuellos de botella y mejorar tasas de conversión. Los datos completos y precisos permiten análisis significativo.

nl.text:
Wanneer contract is signed en deal closed:

  • Move deal to Won stage
  • Verify final deal value (actual closing price)
  • Confirm commission amount
  • Set actual closing date
  • Add final notes over closing process

en.text:
When contract is signed and deal closed:

  • Move deal to Won stage
  • Verify final deal value (actual closing price)
  • Confirm commission amount
  • Set actual closing date
  • Add final notes about closing process

es.text:
Cuando el contrato está firmado y el deal cerrado:

  • Mueve deal a etapa Ganado
  • Verifica valor final del deal (precio de cierre real)
  • Confirma monto de comisión
  • Establece fecha de cierre real
  • Agrega notas finales sobre proceso de cierre

nl.text:
Na successful closing:

  • Generate commission invoice
  • Request client testimonial
  • Ask voor referrals
  • Send thank you email
  • Schedule follow-up (3-6 months)
  • Update property status to Sold/Rented

en.text:
After successful closing:

  • Generate commission invoice
  • Request client testimonial
  • Ask for referrals
  • Send thank you email
  • Schedule follow-up (3-6 months)
  • Update property status to Sold/Rented

es.text:
Después del cierre exitoso:

  • Generar factura de comisión
  • Solicitar testimonio del cliente
  • Pedir referencias
  • Enviar email de agradecimiento
  • Programar seguimiento (3-6 meses)
  • Actualizar estado de propiedad a Vendida/Alquilada

nl.text:
Wanneer deal niet doorgaat:

  • Move deal to Lost stage
  • Select loss reason (verplicht)
  • Add detailed notes explaining wat happened
  • Document competitor information (indien applicable)
  • Note lessons learned

en.text:
When deal doesn't close:

  • Move deal to Lost stage
  • Select loss reason (required)
  • Add detailed notes explaining what happened
  • Document competitor information (if applicable)
  • Note lessons learned

es.text:
Cuando el deal no cierra:

  • Mueve deal a etapa Perdido
  • Selecciona razón de pérdida (obligatorio)
  • Agrega notas detalladas explicando qué pasó
  • Documenta información de competidor (si aplica)
  • Nota lecciones aprendidas

nl.text:
Common loss reasons:

  • Price: Too expensive, couldn't negotiate
  • Competition: Chose another agent/property
  • Financing: Mortgage denied, insufficient funds
  • Timing: Not ready, circumstances changed
  • Property: Issues discovered, didn't meet expectations
  • Communication: Poor response, service issues
  • Other: Specify in notes

Accurate categorization enables pattern analysis.

en.text:
Common loss reasons:

  • Price: Too expensive, couldn't negotiate
  • Competition: Chose another agent/property
  • Financing: Mortgage denied, insufficient funds
  • Timing: Not ready, circumstances changed
  • Property: Issues discovered, didn't meet expectations
  • Communication: Poor response, service issues
  • Other: Specify in notes

Accurate categorization enables pattern analysis.

es.text:
Razones comunes de pérdida:

  • Precio: Demasiado caro, no se pudo negociar
  • Competencia: Eligió otro agente/propiedad
  • Financiamiento: Hipoteca negada, fondos insuficientes
  • Timing: No listo, circunstancias cambiaron
  • Propiedad: Problemas descubiertos, no cumplió expectativas
  • Comunicación: Mala respuesta, problemas de servicio
  • Otro: Especificar en notas

La categorización precisa permite análisis de patrones.

nl.text:
Key metrics te monitoren:

  • Win rate: % won deals van total
  • Loss rate by reason: Welke reasons most common
  • Win rate by stage: Waar deals meestal lost gaan
  • Average time to close: Won vs lost deals
  • Win rate by agent: Individual performance

Actionable insights:

  • If loss reason = Price: Review pricing strategy
  • If loss reason = Competition: Analyze competitor offerings
  • If loss at Negotiation: Improve offer preparation
  • If long time-to-close: Streamline processes

en.text:
Key metrics to monitor:

  • Win rate: % won deals of total
  • Loss rate by reason: Which reasons most common
  • Win rate by stage: Where deals usually get lost
  • Average time to close: Won vs lost deals
  • Win rate by agent: Individual performance

Actionable insights:

  • If loss reason = Price: Review pricing strategy
  • If loss reason = Competition: Analyze competitor offerings
  • If loss at Negotiation: Improve offer preparation
  • If long time-to-close: Streamline processes

es.text:
Métricas clave a monitorear:

  • Tasa de ganancia: % deals ganados del total
  • Tasa de pérdida por razón: Qué razones son más comunes
  • Tasa de ganancia por etapa: Dónde los deals usualmente se pierden
  • Tiempo promedio de cierre: Deals ganados vs perdidos
  • Tasa de ganancia por agente: Rendimiento individual

Insights accionables:

  • Si razón de pérdida = Precio: Revisar estrategia de precios
  • Si razón de pérdida = Competencia: Analizar ofertas de competidores
  • Si pérdida en Negociación: Mejorar preparación de oferta
  • Si tiempo de cierre largo: Optimizar procesos

nl.text:
• Be honest: Accurate loss reasons, even if uncomfortable
  • Detail matters: Comprehensive notes helpen future decisions
  • Review monthly: Analyze won/lost patterns monthly
  • Learn from losses: Each lost deal is learning opportunity
  • Follow up lost: Some may return in future

en.text:
• Be honest: Accurate loss reasons, even if uncomfortable
  • Detail matters: Comprehensive notes help future decisions
  • Review monthly: Analyze won/lost patterns monthly
  • Learn from losses: Each lost deal is learning opportunity
  • Follow up lost: Some may return in future

es.text:
• Ser honesto: Razones de pérdida precisas, incluso si son incómodas
  • El detalle importa: Las notas completas ayudan en decisiones futuras
  • Revisar mensualmente: Analiza patrones ganado/perdido mensualmente
  • Aprender de pérdidas: Cada deal perdido es oportunidad de aprendizaje
  • Hacer seguimiento de perdidos: Algunos pueden volver en el futuro

question.nl: Kan ik een lost deal reactiveren?
question.en: Can I reactivate a lost deal?

answer.nl: Ja, lost deals kunnen reactivated worden naar appropriate stage als client returns. All history blijft preserved, inclusief original loss reason.
answer.en: Yes, lost deals can be reactivated to appropriate stage if client returns. All history remains preserved, including original loss reason.
answer.es: Sí, los deals perdidos pueden reactivarse a etapa apropiada si el cliente regresa. Todo el historial se preserva, incluyendo razón de pérdida original.
